summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed individual to appear and testify in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906. The subpoena is dated July 12, 2021, and signed by the U.S. Attorney and an Assistant U.S. Attorney.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The individual who is the defendant in the criminal case referenced in the subpoena, United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).

persons.name: Audr Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands an unnamed individual to appear before the United States District Court for the Southern District of New York to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 12, 2021, for an individual to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case on November 29, 2021.
The subpoena is for the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
The subpoena was issued by U.S. Attorney Audr Strauss for the Southern District of New York.
The recipient of the subpoena is not named in the provided text.
Failure to comply with the subpoena constitutes contempt of court and subjects the individual to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
